dependencies.description: Autoconf -- system configuration part of autotools
dependencies.name: autoconf

dependencies.description: Automake -- make file builder part of autotools
dependencies.name: automake

dependencies.description: GNU binutils, which contain the linker, assembler, objdump and others
dependencies.name: binutils

dependencies.description:
Bison is a general-purpose parser generator that converts an annotated
context-free grammar into a deterministic LR or generalized LR (GLR)
parser employing LALR(1) parser tables.
dependencies.name: bison

dependencies.description: Expat is an XML parser library written in C.
dependencies.name: expat

dependencies.description: Flex is a tool for generating scanners.
dependencies.name: flex

dependencies.description: GNU internationalization (i18n) and localization (l10n) library.
dependencies.name: gettext

dependencies.description:
OpenGL Extension to the X Window System. This extension defines a
protocol for the client to send 3D rendering commands to the X server.
dependencies.name: glproto

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
Toolkit for the construction of highly optimized compilers, optimizers,
and run-time environments.
dependencies.name: libllvm

dependencies.description: libtool -- library building part of autotools.
dependencies.name: libtool

dependencies.description: libX11 - Core X11 protocol client library.
dependencies.name: libx11

dependencies.description:
The X protocol C-language Binding (XCB) is a replacement for Xlib
featuring a small footprint, latency hiding, direct access to the
protocol, improved threading support, and extensibility.
dependencies.name: libxcb

dependencies.description: libXext - library for common extensions to the X11 protocol.
dependencies.name: libxext

dependencies.description:
Libxml2 is the XML C parser and toolkit developed for the Gnome project
(but usable outside of the Gnome platform), it is free software
available under the MIT License.
dependencies.name: libxml2

dependencies.description: GNU M4 is an implementation of the traditional Unix macro processor.
dependencies.name: m4

dependencies.description:
The ncurses (new curses) library is a free software emulation of curses
in System V Release 4.0, and more. It uses terminfo format, supports
pads and color and multiple highlights and forms characters and
function-key mapping, and has all the other SYSV-curses enhancements
over BSD curses.
dependencies.name: ncurses

dependencies.description:
pkgconf is a program which helps to configure compiler and linker flags
for development frameworks. It is similar to pkg-config from
freedesktop.org, providing additional functionality while also
maintaining compatibility.
dependencies.name: pkgconfig

dependencies.description:
A super-fast templating language that borrows the best ideas from the
existing templating languages.
dependencies.name: py-mako

dependencies.description: The Python programming language.
dependencies.name: python

dependencies.description: zlib replacement with optimizations for next generation systems.
dependencies.name: zlib-api

description:
Mesa is an open-source implementation of the OpenGL specification - a
system for rendering interactive 3D graphics.
name: mesa18

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
